label: YRL216 / YRL236
description: Assure Lever Keypad with Z-Wave Plus

metadata.inclusion:
To include; Enter the 4-8 master Pin code followed by the gear key.
Press the 7 key followed by the gear key
Press the 1 key followed by the gear key
metadata.exclusion:
To exclude; Enter the 4-8 digit master pin code followed by the gear key
Press the 7 key followed by the gear key
Press the 3 key followed by the gear key
metadata.reset:
Remove the battery cover and batteries.
Remove the interior escutcheon to access the reset button.
The reset button is located above the PCB cable connector.
While pressing the reset button for a minimum of 3 seconds, reinstall batteries. Release reset button.
Replace battery cover. 
Please use this procedure only when the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable
